captions.text:
<i>♪ outside the cars in</i>
<i>the city go rushing by ♪</i>

<i>♪ I search for the beat</i>
<i>in this dirty town ♪</i>

<i>♪ down town</i>
<i>the young ones are going ♪</i>

<i>A way normal life</i>
<i>for a teenage girl.</i>

<i>I mean, I get up,</i>
<i>I brush my teeth,</i>
<i>♪ but we don't do it here ♪</i>

<i>Even lucy, our maid,</i>
<i>is terrified of him.</i>

<i>But he fights with me for free</i>
<i>because I'm his daughter.</i>

Daddy.
Cher, please don't start
with the juice again.

comments.text:
"Mr. Hall how can I answer that? The topic is Haiti and she's talking about 
some little party"! LOVE IT! I was so into Clueless in high school that my 
mom designed all of my outfits and made them by hand. I had tons of bright 
colored little skirts, blazers and sweaters with fur on the sleeves! And my 
outfit wasn't complete without my pen with fur on the end. People called me 
Cher (from clueless) or Barbie. <3 #GoodMemories   #CluelessForLife  ﻿
